componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.1 - Do we know the customers Key Decision Making Criteria and can we comply with it?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.2 - Do we have approval from our company?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.3 - Do we have relevant references and evidence of capability?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.4 - Do we have the resources and ability to deliver, if we win?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.5 - Do we have operational support and commitment to this opportunity?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.6 - Do we already supply services to this prospect?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 1.7 - Do we have a successful track record with similar opportunities in this sector/service?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 2.1 - Do any of our competitors have an overwhelming advantage over us?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 2.2 - Do we understand why they are looking to change, why now and why they would change to us?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 2.3 - Does the prospect express a bias for one of our competitors?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 2.4 - Do we know who the current incumbent and competotion are?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 2.5 - Do we have any current relationship problems with the prospect which may put us at a disadvantage?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 3.1 - Have we had the opportunity to influence their bid/tender document?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 3.2 - Do we have USP's that improve our odds of winning?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 3.3 - Are the contract terms and conditions acceptable to us?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 3.4 - Is this opportunity aligned with our own strategic target market?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 4.1 - Has the prospect specified realistic timescales for review and implementation?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 4.2 - Do we have sufficient time to prepare a professional response?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 4.3 - Can we serve the locations required?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 4.4 - Are we comfortable with the timescales of when it will go live?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 5.1 - Should we prioritise this opportunity within our pipeline?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 5.2 - Will winning put any of our existing business at risk?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 5.3 - Do we have the resources we need to bid for this opportunity?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 5.4 - Does this opportunity have strategic importance to the business?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 6.1 - Are there consequences to us of losing or not bidding?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 6.2 - Does the prospect have a realistic budget for this opportunity?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 6.3 - Do we have access to the key budget holder(s)?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 6.4 - Is price a major factor in selecting the winning bid?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.1 - Do we know (and can we influence) the key decision makers?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.2 - Has the budget been formally approved and funded?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.3 - Do we know the evaluation criteria and how it will be weighted?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.4 - Do we have any inside advocates in the Decision Making group?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.5 - Are consultants/advisors involved in the decision?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.6 - Do we know the customer's organisation chart?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 7.7 - Do we undertstand the business and personal needs of all the key stakeholders?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 8.1 - Does the prospect have a critical/compelling need to change?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: 8.2 - Is the client serious about making a decision, or is this more of an exercise in information gathering, market testing initiative or benchmark?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: List Unusual or Specific Requirements - Financial

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: List Unusual or Specific Requirements - Legal

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
0 - We have all the detail and information required.


1 - This is a work in progress where we have some information but need more or have a planned appointment to get it.

10 - We do not know the answer or is a potential showstopper.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This SCOTSMAN has already been cloned. You can only clone the latest submitted record.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This SCOTSMAN has been submitted and so is locked. If you need to make changes then please clone the record and make your changes to the new record.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Once you have finished making your changes please submit the SCOTSMAN. Once submitted you will be able to clone the SCOTSMAN to record any future changes in situation.
